00016 
00017 #include <sys/types.h>
00018 
00019 typedef signed char   SChar;
00020 typedef unsigned char UChar;
00021 typedef signed char   Int8;
00022 typedef unsigned char Uns8;
00023 typedef __int16_t     Int16;
00024 typedef __uint16_t    Uns16;
00025 typedef __int32_t     Int32;
00026 typedef __uint32_t    Uns32;
00027 typedef __int64_t     Int64;
00028 typedef __uint64_t    Uns64;
00029 typedef double        Flt64;
00030 typedef unsigned char Bool;
00031 
00032 // common to all toolchains
00033 #define False         ((Bool)0)
00034 #define True          ((Bool)1)
00035 typedef Uns64         Addr;
00036 typedef Int64         Offset;
00037 
00038 typedef Uns32         UnsPS;
